name: XCOPY ERC-721 "NGMI" - Block 12524701 - 1/100
description:
4800x4800 image.

This artwork shows the first mint of XCOPY's "NGMI" artwork that was sold at Sothebys - https://www.sothebys.com/en/buy/auction/2021/natively-digital-a-curated-nft-sale-2/ngmi.

It was minted on May 28, 2021 & sold at auction at Sothebys on June 10th 2021 for 378,000 USD.

Token Mint: https://etherscan.io/tx/0x1eeeb9fd581272d63b0d75e40d2306c5fac283b27a770995d9246c13350f51f3
